summary: KL Rahul, is an Indian international cricketer.

value.label: Kannur Lokesh Rahul
Mangaluru
5 ft 11 in (180 cm)
Indian
Batsman, Wicket-keeper

image.altText: Image of Jain University, Bengaluru, India

value.label: Top-order right-handed batsman and occasional wicket-keeper.
Rahul made his first-class cricket debut for Karnataka in the 2012–13 season
The Ranji Trophy is a domestic first-class cricket championship played in India between teams representing regional and state cricket associations.

value.label: Rahul made his Test debut in the 2014 Boxing Day Test at the Melbourne, versus Australia
The Australia national cricket team is the joint oldest team in Test cricket history, having played in the first ever Test match in 1877.

image.altText: Image of Australia national cricket team

value.label: Rahul made his IPL debut in 2013 for Royal Challengers Bangalore as a wicket-keeper batsman
The Royal Challengers Bangalore are a franchise cricket team based in Bangalore, Karnataka, that plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
K.L.Rahul is the first Indian to score a century on One Day International debut

value.label: In the finals of the 2014-15 Duleep Trophy, Rahul scored 185 off 233 balls in the first innings and 130 off 152 in the second

value.label: Rahul is the first player in T20I history to score a century when batting at number 4 position or lower

image.altText: Rahul is the first player in T20I history to score a century when batting at number 4 position or lower

value.label: Rahul is the first Indian opener to score a century in his debut Test in the West Indies.

image.altText: Rahul is the first Indian opener to score a century in his debut Test in the West Indies.

value.label: The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.

image.altText: Picture of India national cricket team

value.label: The Kings XI Punjab (KXIP) are a franchise cricket team based in Mohali (Chandigarh CR), Punjab, that plays in the Indian Premier League.
Domestic Ranji trophy cricket team based in the state of Karnataka
